amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit the use of funds for a project under investigation by the Inspector General of the Department of the Interior during calendar years 2015, 2016, or 2017.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds for a project under investigation by the Inspector General of the Department of the Interior during calendar years 2015, 2016, or 2017.

action.text: Mr. Simpson raised a point of order against the McNerney amendment (A043). Mr. Simpson stated that the amendment seeks to change existing law and constitutes legislation in an appropriations bill. The Chair sustained the point of order.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A043) offered by Mr. McNerney.
